newsitem.title: UK: Adminstore in 7.4 mln stg offer for Cullens.
newsitem.headline: Adminstore in 7.4 mln stg offer for Cullens.

text.p: British food retailer Adminstore on Friday said it had made a recommended cash offer for rival Cullen's Holdings, valuing the branded retailer of groceries, wines and spirits at approximately 7.4 million stg.
The offer values Cullen's share at 28 pence per share, representing a premium of 16.7 percent to the closing mid-market price of 24 pence on May 8.
Adminstore has received irrevocable commitments in respect of 32.1 percent of the issued share capital. The board of Cullen's is unanimously recommending shareholders accept the offer.
Adminstore, founded in 1985, owns 38 stores trading under the Europa Foods and Harts the Grocer brands in central London.
